dict.acceptation: 反对；反对的话，异议；反对的理由；

sent.orig: The case proceed notwithstanding the objection of the defendant or the defendant's objection notwithstanding.
sent.trans: 尽管被告反对，拆讼照常进行。

sent.orig: I have no principled objection to it, ie no objection based on moral scruples.
sent.trans: 从道德上来说，我并不反对此事。

sent.orig: Objection: To improve the success rate of air enema reduction of infant intussusception and decrease complications.
sent.trans: 目的：提高小儿急性肠套叠空气灌肠整复成功率及预防并发症。

sent.orig: I see no objection whatsoever to give them a lecture on tragedies.
sent.trans: 我根本不反对给他们开一个讲座，谈谈悲剧。

sent.orig: It is rather that she has not the time, not that I have any objection.
sent.trans: 是因为她没有时间，倒不是我反对。
